name: Lyto
description:
Lyto is a fast-paced adventure in which the player takes on various challenges and puzzles using fluid mechanics, our main ones being Push and Swing.

This is a game created by 3 driven game developers from Polytechnic of Leiria, the main goal was to create a game concept that would have fluid movement which felt satisfying to use for all types of players.

Game Artist: Angela Mateus

Game Designer: André Pereira

Game Developer: Roberto Costa

Find us on our social medias:

https://twitter.com/TrochiStudio

https://www.indiedb.com/games/lyto
